text: (he nabee!) unase kaho ki kya main allaah ke siva kisee doosare nyaayakaaree kee khoj karoon, jabaki useene tumhaaree or ye khulee pustak (quraan) utaaree[1] hai? tatha jihen hamane pustak[2] pradaan kee hai, ve jaanate hain ki ye quraan aapake paalanahaar kee or se saty ke saath utara hai. atah aap sandeh karane vaalon mein se na hon
